channel.title: [PI](317) Pk points system, 2 starters.x logg/dc////noclip

item.title: [PI](317) Pk points system, 2 starters.x logg/dc////noclip
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

Project insanity source mtp v2
317

Hi sorry im new anyways.

Ok my pk point system is messed and i have no clue where to look. all i know is everything is good. but. there are to problems.

  • When my characters die to a monster they get 4 pk points.

  • were can i change the points given to you when you kill some one.
    you get pk points when killing some 1 in pits. i guess u get pk points when ever u kill some one anywhere. how do i fix

  • My starters.

  • Ok well you get to starters and i was looking around and found

public void addStarter() { if (!Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.getItems().addItem(995,20000000); c.getItems().addItem(3025,500); c.getItems().addItem(6686,500); c.getItems().addItem(2443,100); c.getItems().addItem(2437,100); c.getItems().addItem(2441,100); c.getItems().addItem(2445,100); c.getItems().addItem(565,20000); c.getItems().addItem(560,40000); c.getItems().addItem(555,60000); c.getItems().addItem(392,1000); c.getItems().addItem(8007,100); c.getItems().addItem(8008,100); c.getItems().addItem(8009,100); c.getItems().addItem(8010,100); c.getItems().addItem(8011,100); Connection.addIpToStarterList1(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToStarter1(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); c.sendMessage("You have recieved 1 out of 2 starter packages on this IP address."); } else if (Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom) && !Connection.hasRecieved2ndStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.getItems().addItem(995,20000000); c.getItems().addItem(3025,500); c.getItems().addItem(6686,500); c.getItems().addItem(2443,100); c.getItems().addItem(2437,100); c.getItems().addItem(2441,100); c.getItems().addItem(2445,100); c.getItems().addItem(565,20000); c.getItems().addItem(560,40000); c.getItems().addItem(555,60000); c.getItems().addItem(392,1000); c.getItems().addItem(8007,100); c.getItems().addItem(8008,100); c.getItems().addItem(8009,100); c.getItems().addItem(8010,100); c.getItems().addItem(8011,100); c.sendMessage("You have recieved 2 out of 2 starter packages on this IP address."); Connection.addIpToStarterList2(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); Connection.addIpToStarter2(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); } else if (Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom) && Connection.hasRecieved2ndStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { c.sendMessage("You have already recieved 2 starters!"); } }

And i tryed removing half of it and got 57 errors. im guessing theres more to it. because i have a folder just for starters holding there ips. i want to make it so you only get 1 starter and everytime you log on it doesnt keep asying you already have a starter.

thanks

How can i make it so if u x log/dc in a fight ur account stays logged on . kinda like lets say ur in a fight and try x logging how can i make it so ur account stays on and dies and loses it instead of it dcing instanity

If you attack someone in wildy it will run through walls to get to them. how can i make it so it runs to them without running through shit also same with folllowing
